definition: to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: She’s also an avid street skateboarder.
sentences.chinese: 她还是一个热心的街头滑板爱好者。

sentences.english: On my first time I accidentally crashed into a snow boarder.
sentences.chinese: 第一次滑下来的时候我不小心撞上玩雪地滑板的人。

sentences.english: There, awaiting my uneasy embrace, are some five or six skateboards .
sentences.chinese: 那里，五六块轮滑板，正等候我心神不安的拥抱。

sentences.english: Then, the wave catches the surfboard and pulls it and the surfer toward the shore.
sentences.chinese: 接著大浪会涌向滑板，将滑板与冲浪者推往海岸。

sentences.english: Then, the wave catches the surfboard and pulls it and the surfer toward the shore.
sentences.chinese: 接著大浪会涌向滑板，将滑板与冲浪者推往海岸。

sentences.english: I dare you to skateboard to Krusty Burger and back.
sentences.chinese: 我说你不敢踩着滑板往返库里斯蒂汉堡。

sentences.english: But of all the presents, I like the scooter best.
sentences.chinese: 但是在所有的礼物里，我最喜欢滑板车。
她是一名优秀的滑板者。

sentences.english: Applicable on rotating and sliding vertical injection molding machine.
sentences.chinese: 转盘机或滑板机等多工位成型中水口料头之夹取。

sentences.english: Would you like to ride my new scooter?
sentences.chinese: 你想不想骑我的新滑板车？

sentences.english: I also liked skateboarding since I was a kid, so the two kind of like, meshed together.
sentences.chinese: 我从小就喜欢滑板，所以这两个就，混在一起了。

sentences.english: Why do Monastics Prefer Skateboards to Bicycles?
sentences.chinese: 为什么僧人比自行车喜欢滑板？

sentences.english: Cutting small slits in the grip tape will help it to fit on the skateboard.
sentences.chinese: 切割开衩的夹持带小，以适应将帮助它在滑板。

sentences.english: We had been visiting her cousin Mike who had managed to break his leg in a skateboard accident.
sentences.chinese: 之前我们在探望她那玩滑板弄伤了腿的表哥迈克。

sentences.english: They come to my house, they take my they take 99 of my skateboards.
sentences.chinese: 他们跑到我家来，拿走了我的99个滑板。

sentences.english: The scooters were part of the cargo confiscated by Israeli troops from the Gaza-bound flotilla that sailed from Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 这些滑板车是以军收缴来自土耳其船只货物的一部分。

definition: stand-up paddleboarding (SUP)/stand-up paddleboard/blade of a propeller/blade of an oar
